title: Poster, 1970
medium: Offset lithograph on wove paper, mounted on linen
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description:
Against a grass-green background, a photograph of a girl with voluminous brown hair and a stubborn expression; "torn" in the lower right corner.
Inscriptions: at center right: "un film de / FRANCOIS TRUFFAUT", and at lower right, the title "l'enfant / SAUVAGE", followed by further credits in smaller type.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, 1970.
1970. Offset lithograph on wove paper, mounted on linen. Gift of Sara and Marc Benda. 2010-21-28.
